If you want to stay consistent with the core styles I would use REM - <https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-theme-boilerplate/blob/main/src/css/elements/_typography.css|https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-theme-boilerplate/blob/main/src/css/elements/_typography.css>

Rem gives control to the user to increase font size pixels gives control to you the developer.

I need a simple point in the right direction. I have been through the docs and the code and still cannot figure out how to get more than 10 blogs articles listed at a time on the blog-index.html page. I don't see a setting either via the theme (theme.json), dnd, or the javascript in any of the modules (e.g., blog-listings, blog-pagination).
Hey Dave, have you checked in your `Settings > Website > Blog > Templates tab` area? There should be a setting called “Number of posts per listing page”
D'oh! Thank you AJ for the prompt response. That did the trick. :slightly_smiling_face:
